Now Page - Achyut Joshi

What I am doing right now

I am currently in Jodhpur focusing on these things -
  • Working on my B.Tech project where I am predicting flight prices to suggest whether the prices will fall or rise in future.
  • Trying out the Bullet Journal to organise my daily work
  • Trying out new datasets from Kaggle to make my analytics strong.
  • Studying basics of network security so that I can start contributing in Bug Bounty
  • Having sold my first startup, looking for a freelance project to earn some money
  • Searching for opportunites in the data science field after I graduate
  • Always Be Reading, currently -
    • Sapiens:A Brief History of Humankind
    • Too Big to Fail by Andrew Sorkin
    • Doing Bayesian Data Analysis by John Kruschke
  • Listening to The Tim Ferris Show

Last Updated on 21st Nov 2016
